plot: A guerrilla-style documentary focuses on mistreatment of the porters of Mt. Kilimanjaro, the men and women upon whose back the mountaineering industry is quite literally reliant.
title: Porters on the Stone of God
plot_es: A guerrilla-style documentary focuses on mistreatment of the porters of Mt. Kilimanjaro, the men and women upon whose back the mountaineering industry is quite literally reliant.
original_name: Porters on the Stone of God
plot_en: A guerrilla-style documentary focuses on mistreatment of the porters of Mt. Kilimanjaro, the men and women upon whose back the mountaineering industry is quite literally reliant.
